poem:
**Trump-o-mania**

Like a dog with our savings, off-leash,  
the world stands still in a market spin,  
as sand traps cradle the chaos—  
a mulligan for the man in charge.  
Global whispers rustle the air,  
day 79 of the gamble unfolding;  
all of us holding torn tickets,  
a lottery run by the unwound.

Jimmy Kimmel “This is day 79 of Trump-o-mania,” said Jimmy Kimmel on Wednesday. “It’s been fun, watching this lunatic gamble our life’s savings this week.
